dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.inc.SecurityIncidentRelatedParty

Information about parties that are tracking, working, reporting, etc. the security incident

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityIncidentRelatedParty

child.name: role
child.description:
Enumeration of the roles the Security Party plays in the incident, such as Notifying, Affected, Tracking.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: role

child.name: securityIncident
child.description:

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityIncidentTrackedBy

child.label: securityIncident
